1.content:
Lucas Lewis, a well put to gather 20 something year old, was driving down a curvy back road. The dark woods were on each side of him as his headlights painted the road in light. Lucas was going a bit over the average speed limit. He had always thought himself as an expert driver, that disaster could not touch him, but all that was about to change.
Lucas took a sharp turn, the car veered off the road.
"Oh gosh no." Lucas yelled.
The car started to tumble. "No, no, AGGHHH!"
The car tumbled off the road into the dark woods surrounding the road. The car lay in a crumbled heap of mess and mangle. Everything lay still for a while then a foot kicked the car window open. Lucas crawled out of the car amazingly uninjured but in shock. He walked out into the street and started walking down.
Lucas walked for at least a mile when he came across....
1.title: Crashed

choices: Wake up naked in a lab.
Wake up in the middle of the road
11.content:
Lucas stopped in his tracks as a flashlight shined in his eyes.
"Hello," Lucas said squinting his eyes.
The Flashlight lowered revealing a elder man in a lab coat. He had wild hair and a crazed look in his eye. He pushed his glasses up on his nose.
"Hello young man," He said in a raspy voice. "What happened to you?"
"I-I got in a car crash coming down the road. Can you be of any assistants, do you have a phone I could use?" Lucas asked thinking he could trust him.
The old man shined the flash light into Lucas's eyes again. "Are you alone?" He asked.
"What?" Lucas questioned.
"Does anyone know your out here?" The old man said.
"Umm no sir," Lucas said not expecting anything.
The old man lowered the flash light and smiled. "Good."
He took out a gun and shot Lucas in the chest. Lucas fell to the ground breathless. He looked up at the old man wondering why.
The old man smiled. "Don't worry you're not dead, not yet."
Lucas faded out.
11.title: A scientist

111.content:
Lucas awoke unable to move. His arms and legs were strapped down to a table of some sort. He was still alive but barley, the bullet still in his chest. He looked around discovering he was in an all white room. But scattered around the interior were crude instruments and layouts.
A whole entire wall was posted with pictures of people titled FAILED EXPERIMENTS. In front of Lucas was a group of running computers. He wanted to scream but he couldn't. He heard a door open. The old man walked in carrying a white briefcase. He pulled a chair up to Lucas and sat down next to him. He studied Lucas.
"Still alive, I knew I had found a strong one. But you won't be for long will you." The old man picked up the case and placed it on Lucas's bare chest. He took some latex gloves out.
"Your're probably wondering, why am I here. Or am I here to kill you?" He said gesturing to himself. "No, I am not here to kill you sir, I am here to give you rebirth."
The old man looked over to Lucas, he was fading out.
The old man took a needle and put it in Lucas's arm jolting him awake with adrenaline.
"Don't leave me just yet. I need you alive for the process." The old man said taking out a long syringe with black goo like liquid inside of it. Lucas's eyes widened at the site.
"You see sir, I was once a military R&D employee for the military. They wanted me to create the ultimate solider. Perfect. But I told them that if they wanted the "Ultimate" solder they would have to long beyond this world and to another. You see long ago, I had found this concoction in the Norwegian mountains. Legend tells that whomever finds the "Black Pool" will be the father of the Valkyrie."
Lucas gave the Old man a crazed look. He laughed. "That is the same look they gave me!" He said. "They thought I was insane, kicked me out destroyed my reputation.....But I still had my formula, I still had my knowledge. So I set out to create my own solider. Now as you see," The doctor said pointing at the wall of pictures. "I've had some mistakes across the way. But I've made improvements and you my son are going to be the first of a new spices, the dominant species!"
Lucas shook his head and mumbled no as the doctor injected him with the formula.
Lucas's body twitched as his pale skin added color, the cut and bruises he had retained in the crash slowly faded away, the bullet in his chest ejected itself from his body like a crock on a champagne bottle. Lucas's body was repaired. Lucas looked over at the old man.
"Thank you." He said finally able to speak again.
The old man was looking down at Lucas's area.
"Oh it's not over yet my son." The old man said.
Lucas looked down and screamed. His manhood was slowly, painfully, reseeding into his body. Lucas's hip winded.
"What did you do to me!!!" Lucas yelled.
The old man looked at Lucas with wonder "The Valkyrie is being born!"
Lucas screamed in agony as his body continued to transform. His body took on a more female shape becoming more lean and sexy. His stomach flat and chizzled, his legs baby smooth. His hair grew into long locks as his face shifted. He gave the old man one last look.
"Goodbye." The old man said.
Lucas's face became soft and innocent as two mounds started two grow on his chest creating two C sized breast. Lucas grew larger, his body extending a foot longer. Black nails shot out of his finger tips as the straps containing his popped off. He roe off the table as two black wings feathered wings exploded out of his back. He stood tall with his 5 foot wings extending left and right. Lucas was now a beautiful, alien like young woman. He looked down at the old man with pale blue eyes.
"Father." SHE said soft and sweet.
The old man smiled. "Yes my dear, Father."

12.content:
An old cemetery blanketed by fog stood before Lucas. Old gravestones popped out of the surface of the fog, on the far side of the cemetery stood an old crypt.
Lucas grabbed his bruised side.
"I can't go on like this forever; I need to find shelter in till morning." He said starting toward the cemetery. The cemetery was like something out of a horror movie. It was Erie, dark, and silent. Twigs cracked beneath Lucas’s feet as he approached the old crumbling Crypt. Lucas looked up at Crypt with fear. An almost green aura surrounded the back of Crypt. Lucas walked up to the big stone doors of the crypt. Above them was the name, written in curvy lettering, Countess Vanessa.
“Creepy,” Lucas said as he pushed on the entrance to the tomb. It opened with a large CREAK!!! Lucas hesitantly walked inside. He looked around at the interior. Menacing looking statues were posted on the walls of the circler room. In the middle of the room lay a long gray open casket. Out of it shined the green light that outlined the exterior of the building. Lucas, curious, started over to the casket. The door slammed close.
“Holy shit!!” Lucas screamed.
He looked at the door knowing he should probably leave this place but something, something was drawing him, telling him to stay. The green light, he wanted to know what it was. He walked over to the tomb and saw a sight that made him jump out of his skin. A dead female skeleton lay in the casket with a stake jabbed through her chest, a green emerald necklace lay rapped around her neck along with the horrifying revelation. Her teeth, her teeth were pointed. She was a vampire. Lucas stumbled toward the door when he turned back around. He walked back over and examined it for a while, the emerald.
“I could be rich,” He whispered under his breath. “I could be filthy rich with that thing.”
Greed over took him as he ripped the emerald off the vampire’s chest. He held it up to his face examining the giant ruby. “They won’t be missing this I know that much.” He said. “I guess this night turned out good after all.” He said walking away when suddenly he felt strange, sickly even.
He stumbled a little bit. “What’s what’s going…”
Lucas dropped the bracelet as everything started to blur. He felt hot, extremely hot. Sweat poured down his face as if someone had thrown a bucket of water on him. He took off his clothes down to boxers. He still felt hot, almost as if he was melting.
“What whhhaaaaaaaaaaatttttttttssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssslhlsdllggggg” Lucas’s skin slowly started to melt away from his body landing in little plumps of goo on the floor. Lucas was unable to scream as this un godly incident happened to him. Once it was over Lucas breathing deeply touched his face and head. All his hair was gone but his face was unusually soft. It actually felt good to touch. Lucas looked down at the rest of his body. All of his masculinity was gone. What was left was a pale skinny almost, Female creature. He started to gain a little more muscle mass as his nails elongated into black long spikes. A slit slowly grew where his penis formally was as something made Lucas’s chest jolt out. Lucas let out an erotic cry as two breasts exploded from his chest, long dark locks flowed down his back as his butt expanded into something sexy and filled out.
He held his newly formed breast. “What the hell happened to me?” He said.
Lucas eyes rolled to the back of his head he fell to the floor unconscious.
After a few moments someone else arose, someone beautiful and full of new life. She laughed, “Helsing thought he could kill me hahahaa, I thought it was going to be a few hundred years but,” She felt her large breast. She directed her fabulous green eyes to the stone doors which slowly opened. She looked outside ready with a smile.
“They won’t know what hit em.” She said triumphantly.
12.title: A cemetery

121.content:
Lucas was late. Bad things can happen when you're late and in a hurry, concern at the moment was how to tell this to his girlfriend, that he is again late or even not showing up to her invitation.
He had to get to his mobile working somehow to leave her a message or call her, but there was no service… He was somewhere in the middle of nowhere and it was dark, cold and also some strange fog was appearing.
But Lucas was thinking of his girlfriend, how to reach her and how she will react to his excuses…

Still trying to get service for his mobile he stopped in front of the Iron Gate, which indicated the entrance to a spooky cemetery, here in the woods in the middle of nowhere…
Lucas had made the mistake of entering this cursed place….

A commentary is normally not a dangerous place but tonight it was for Lucas, who was still unaware of the tension around him…
Lucas was careless. He was still worried about getting service for his phone than anything else...
Suddenly he saw some person coming his way; it looked like a girl or a young woman…

Lucas was thinking that she maybe has service or a car that she can bring him to the next public phone booth to call his girlfriend and also the wrecker for his broken car…

“Hello” Lucas said to the woman as she got closer to him: Now he could see that she was about his age and pretty attractive, as he could see in the strange twilight around here…

“finally” she said and Lucas wondered, as she suddenly took out a weapon from out of nowhere, most properly an axe, but to late Lucas passed out…
He briefly thought, "Well, this is it…" His vision blurred and whirled, then everything went black as he felt his body slam into something solid and unyielding.

Luca's senses returned slowly and much to his confusion the first thing he noticed was daylight, it was no longer dark and he also could hear sounds of birds chirping nearby in the beautiful trees of this old commentary:
Lucas try to stand up, but the slightest movement wracked his body with pain and caused him to let out an agonized scream before he blacked out again. He must have been seriously injured or damaged by the beat of this strange lady last night, but there was something else he had to discover next moment in cruel detail…

132.content:
Lucas awoke, on the dry leaved forest floor, naked. He was dirty, bloody, and exhausted. He picked himself up a bit sitting crouched on the ground. He pinched his nose. What the hell happened last night?
“Boy, you had a run last night didn’t you?” A voice from behind said.
Lucas flew to his feet and turned around. His jaw dropped at the figure in front of him. An exotic woman sat on a collapsed branch high up in the trees. She was naked, swinging her bare leg back and forth. She dropped of branch toward the forest floor, landing hard on her soft feet. She got up surprisingly unharmed, walking over to Lucas. She swayed her wide hips back and forth, her perky breast bounced with each step. She stopped in front of Lucas putting her hand on her hip in a classic female pose.
“How’s it hanging?” She said looking at Lucas’s penis.
Lucas gulped trying not to get aroused.
“Who are you?” He asked quickly.
She circled Lucas “The one who turned you,” She said.
Lucas twisted his face confused. “What are you-“
Lucas thought about it for another moment then wildly turned toward her knowing the truth.
“You, you’re the one that clawed at me!” He said.
“Guilty as charged, you were in my way, sorry.” She explained.
“You dragged me out here to?” He asked.
“No, you did that yourself.” She explained.
“What are you talking about, what did you do to me?” He yelled.
The girl gave Lucas a sharp look. She looked at him up and down studying him.
“You don’t know do you?” She asked.
“Know what?” He said.
She raised her head and laughed. “You’re a Shifter- .”
Lucas raised an eyebrow. “A shifter, what the hell is that?”
She walked over to Lucas and put her arms him, pulling him close. Her breast pressed against his bare chest.
“There’s a side of you that wants out, a side that is wild and free, a side that has never had a way out in till last night,” Her face was close, her lushes full lips merely inches away from his. Her green eyes giving him a dead stare.
“I unlocked your other side, I made you a shifter.” She whispered.
Lucas was confused. “What the hell are you talking about?”
She walked away from him swaying her hips. “You’ll change every night, your power growing. You’ll embrace your new personality and eventually it’ll brush off onto your normal form, as you can see.” She said shaking her behind.
Lucas didn’t know what to say. He thought she was crazy. She looked back over to him. “You still don’t believe me do you? Well you’ll see tonight, you’ll see.” And with that she jumped off into the forest, disappearing into the brush.
Lucas raised his arms "WHAT?!!"

1321.content:
Lucas sat down on a tree stump naked and lost. He had wondered the forest for hours with no result. He was officially lost with no chance at rescue.
Another hour had passed, the sun had set, and Lucas sat in the quiet moonlit forest. He was cold and starving. He looked up toward the moon which seemed brighter than usual, it seemed, and it seemed to be resonating some kind of energy. He felt the energy of the moon. It was burning but at the same time it felt good real good. Lucas felt his muscle mass slowly decreasing. He was growing shorter, his skin grew smoother. He stood taking deep breaths.
“What’s what’s happening to me?” He said softly.
That wasn’t his voice, that wasn’t him. At this moment of realization the energy of the moon increased tenfold. Lucas fell to ground to dirt floor overwhelmed. It pressed a few buttons on the screen while still looking at Lucas. The screen disappeared as a crumbling hum sounded over Lucas. A black nozzle slowly manifested over the cylinder. Lucas didn’t have time to react when a green liquid filled the cylinder. It shot in the cylinder like a fire hose filling it up with lighting speed. Lucas coughed up the green liquid as it blinded him. As Lucas swam around in the liquid his skin began to melt away, his bones fell a part, he was melding with the liquid becoming it. Lucas yelled one last time as he disappeared into the thick green liquid.
142.title: Wake up in an laboratory

1422.content: Lucas looses all sense of time while trapped in that state. Lucas dreams strange dreams. Suddenly Lucas's eyes open. "I have eyes again", Lucas thanks to himself. Just then an alien appears above. Surprisingly, it begins to speak though it's mouth doesn't match the sounds. Lucas realizes the sounds are coming out of a device in it's hand. "So sorry, you're biological structure did not take very well to the suspension agent. It completely destroyed one of your chromosomes. Fortunately we were able to duplicate your remaining chromosome to reconstitute you. It was Rasias fault, Rasias is new", the alien explains motioning towards another alien. Lucas raises a hand and rub his head. As he does he notice his hand looks different, slender and feminine. "What the hell", Lucas mutters? Lucas then hears his voice, again very feminine. Lucas looks down at herself. Her view is obstructed by what appears to be two very large breasts with erect nipples on top. "Holy shit, you turned me into a girl", Lucas shouts! Lucas can swear that the alien's face appears to be confused. "Girl, this word does not translate. You do appear different, but this was programmed into your genetic structure. Please explain", it says. "Girl, the opposite of boy you alien idiots", Lucas shouts! The alien appears to be thinking. "Ah, boy, girl, yes I understand now. Your species is separated into two genders requiring two individuals for procreation. A very inefficient and primitive method. Why does it matter if you're a girl, or boy? Seems like a very trivial thing", the alien says. Lucas swings off the table raises her hands and demands, "Change me back right now." Alarmed by Lucas's behavior the other alien pulls out another device and pulls the trigger. The last thing Lucas hears before she passes out is, "Rasias, that was not necessary."

1422111.title: Continue

15.content:
Lucas continued down the dark road when he heard a roaring screech overhead. The sound of propellers and snapping wood echoed as a helicopter came crashing down in the middle of the road. Lucas ran down into a ditch as the fuel tank of the helicopter exploded sending fiery debris his way. Lucas waited for everything to calm down in till coming out. Looked up out of the ditch, It was chaos. Small fires raged around the mangled remains of a military helicopter. The end propeller still slowly spun. Lucas slowly walked toward the wreckage, wondering if there were any survivors. Suddenly the cockpit was kicked open and figure crawled out. Lucas ran over to the figure. An old man lay in the wreckage bloody and bruised. Lucas came up to him, crouching down checking if he was alright. The old man’s white lab coat was covered in blood and riddled with bullet holes. His glasses were bent and clothes almost torn off. What else had this man bee through? The old man jumped to life grabbing Lucas’s shoulder.
“Get away from me,” He said. “Now, get away before she comes.”
Lucas looked down at a blood stained name tag. Sanders, Fred Sanders it said.
“Dr. Sanders it’s going to be okay, you were in an accident.” Lucas told him.
The old man twitched unnaturally looking around. “They’re dead, they’re all dead. Nothing was stopping her bullets, grenades, nothing. My entire fault, I tested it on myself and she came out.”
Lucas looked down at the man’s stomach. There was a large piece of shrapnel sticking out of it. He was fading.
“I took the copter and ran but she followed,” He said. Lucas looked around. “She’s still here.” Lucas looked back down at him horrified. “Run, now why you still can, she’ll take you. You’re young and healthy, fit for use.” The old man’s chest jolted forward unnaturally as he choked up. Lucas began to back away heeding the man’s warning when he squeezed the Lucas’s arm like a mad man. Lucas looked back at him. He had a crooked crazed smile on his face. “To late handsome,” He said in a high pitched voice.
Lucas yelled as black liquid slithered out of Sanders mouth and down Lucas’s throat. Lucas coughed as the liquid swan around in his stomach like a snake. A faint whisper entered his mind.
“Don’t worry baby just relax. It’ll all be over soon.” It said.
“What are you?” Lucas said holding his head in pain.
“Power baby, unlimited beautiful power,” It said morphing into an exotic female voice. Something made Lucas rip off every piece off his clothing. He fell on his back naked as the liquid travel throughout his body. He felt it under his skin, on his bones, his muscle. It was cold and wet. It was rearranging his skeleton. It was changing everything. Adding new organs and destroying old ones.
“What are doing to me?” Lucas muttered.
“Shhh this is the best part.” The voice said.
Lucas heaved as he felt himself grow a few inches shorter. His butt rounded, hips winded, and his penis softened pulling itself slowly within his body. That resulted in Lucas’s voice ascending higher in pitch. He cried out as the transformation continued to occur. He rubbed his smooth feminine legs together as a vagina took form in place of his member. The voice purred. “MMM it only gets better from here.” Lucas’s nails grew out. His arms loss his male lean muscle. Lucas’s stomach flattened as his body took an hour glass form. Lucas’s fat went to his chest forming two mounds that slowly grew. Lucas parted his soft pick lips unable to breathe as his new breast grew. His brown nipples grew hard in the cold air on top of his large sexy breast. His skin took a tan complexion; his face softened and shifted losing any trace of his former male image. Black locks washed over Lucas’s face as the voice said.
“Babe, what’s your name again?”
“L-Lucas”
“Goodnight Lucas.”
Lucas grabbed his head in pain as he felt his brain sloshing around transforming its self. Blood trickled out of his nose down to his soft cheek. Everything Lucas was, his memories, his personality all of it faded away…………….
The entity got up brushing her naked body off. She examined her curvy body admiring every inch. “Wow,” She said. “This guy turned out way better than that old fart.” She looked over to Sanders dead body. “Well dead old body.” She let out an evil giggle followed by a soft moan of ecstasy as she let her hands ride down her body. A Helicopter could be heard in the distance. The roar of Humvees sounded down the road.
“Here they come.” She said.
Military Humvees pulled up a few feet away from the entity. She smiled as soldiers flooded out of the Humvees taking positions in front of her, guns trained, ready to fire. An armed helicopter floated over head with a spotlight on the entity. Captain Patrick Martin exited a Humvee with a megaphone in hand. He started at the entity with the greatest hatred.
“I don’t know what you are but we've seen the tapes, release Doctor Sanders now!” Captain Martin commanded.
The entity’s long lock twirled in the wind. “Already released chief,” She said gesturing toward Sanders dead body. Martin swallowed anger, Sanders was a good man.
“I didn't kill him,” She said. “You did you trigger happy bastard.”
Martin growled. “Release your new host now!”
“Or what you’ll be pushed to use deadly force?” The entity taunted.
“Something tells me I’ll be granting your host a favor if I did!” Martin replied.
“That’s nice, but Sanders was old so my body was pathetic. But this guy he’s young and I have all the means to back myself up. Even if you were to get a shot in me and my host would be fine.” The entity explained.
“We’ll see about that bitch, READY YOUR ARMS!!”
The soldiers cocked their guns ready to fire when ordered. The entity laughed letting her arms out and closing her brown eyes.
“FIRE, FIRE, FIRE!!!!”
A blitz of gunfire rushed toward the entity. The bullets riddled her body with no effect. Martin watched in disbelief as each bullet hit her wondrous body. Each bullet sparked and disintegrated with each hit. Her body lit like the fourth of July, spark after spark on each inch of her body. The soldier’s fire stopped as silence took over. Nothing was heard other than the sound of the helicopter and the crackling of fire. The entity opened her eyes and licked her lips. Martin gulped knowing nothing good was going to come from this. The entity lowered her hands to thigh length. She twirled her fingers. The small fires surrounding her came to life, slithering down the asphalt like a snake. The fire crawls up her body, making something of a suit. The fire burns on her body like a living suit. Her brown eyes glows with the fire. The soldiers begin to back up.
“You ready to play with fire?”
The entity raises her hands, tentacles of fire fly off of her body toward the soldiers who run for their lives. The tentacles exploded on contact, destroying Humvees and burning soldiers alive in a flurry of explosions. A fire ball is excelled toward the helicopter blowing it up. In crashes to the ground abolishing anything left of the Humvees. Fires rage atop mangled metal. Burned deceased bodies lay in the street. Martin lays on the road barley alive. He starts to get up when a hot bare foot steps on his throat, pressing him down. The entity stands over him with anger.
“You see all of this; I can do so much more just try me. I left you alive this time, just so you what the hell you’re dealing with. But if you ever come after me again, if I ever see that face of yours again, I’ll kill you.”
The entity took her foot off martin’s throat and walked away into the darkness with her new body.

151.title: The end??? Or beginning??

info.brief_description: A collection of stories featuring a variety of transformations post a fatal car-accident
info.description:
After a fatal car crash, Lucas Lewis, stumbles into a...well that's for you to decide!
The basis is to create different transformation/TG stories. Maybe Lucas stumbles onto an burial ground hunted by a ghost that requires a new body. Maybe he comes across a pack of gender changing were-woman, or discovers an ancient Crystal that transforms him into a Amazon wonder!
YOU DECIDE!
Make it a one-shot or an entire story. The first story will give you an outline of what you should aim for when writing. Please leave reviews and add as you like.
ENJOY!!

TG accident 2 is here!!! Sorry it took so long. Also along with TGA2 I'll still be adding to TGA1 when I can. There are a few stories that need tying up.
